p: SLF adults exhibited strong edge effects in all vineyards sampled (χ 2 = 237.3, df = 5, p < 0.0001). Approximately, 54% of SLF were found within the first 15 m of the vineyard edge (Fig. 1). Proportions of SLF decreased as distance from the vineyard edge increased. Similar patterns were observed throughout the growing season in both sampling years (Supplemental Fig. S1).
